articles.author: Joe Rossignol
articles.title: Mac Studio Still Lacks 'High Power Mode' Offered on Some MacBook Pro and Mac Mini Models - MacRumors
articles.description: Ars Technica's Andrew Cunningham today published his review of the new Mac Studio. In it, he confirmed that the Mac Studio with the M4 Max chip...
articles.content: Ars Technica's Andrew Cunningham today published his review of the new Mac Studio. In it, he confirmed that the Mac Studio with the M4 Max chip lacks High Power Mode for intensive workloads. He also … [+1830 chars]
